name: C# style comments and string
description:
It matches all c# style comments and string(literal).
After matches, you can replace it as empty when the matched string starts with "//" or "/*".

See also: https://dotnetfiddle.net/J98Ior
content:
//comment "also comment"abc//another comment
//comment
asdfsdf//comment
//comment"comment"
dfsl//dkjf*/sldjf
sdfsdfsdf
"//not comment"
"//not comment \\also not comment"
"\"//not comment\""
asdfsadf "//not comment"
asdfsadf "//not comment" asdf
/*comment*/
/*
comment
*/
asdf/*comment*/
aasa/*
comment
*/
"/*not comment*/"
@"/*
not comment
*/"
"asdf/*not comment*/"
@"aasa/*
not comment
*/"
"var f;// comment */"
//comment end of line
author: gongdo
